content.description: Fun blind dyno problem that can shut down those who climb much harder than V2. The top out is easy, but committing, so make sure you keep your head on.
content.protection: Crash pad, spotters, but don't fall from the top.
content.location: Sit start on the large holds just as the cave ends, go up and left, then throw around the blunt arete for the great hold.

content.description: Start sitting under horizontal roof below Senor Fuerte; climb in Senor Fuerte and finish.
content.location: Right side of Billiards Wall

content.description: stand start on double 2 finger pockets pulling on and making a hard right hand move to a 3 finger edge, from here jump out to a large jug with the left hand. some people find it easier to pull on with no shoe on the right foot and placing the big toe in a good pocket down and right.an obvious project line starts on starburst and comes out through the line of small pockets to the tribal sound start holds and then pulling through the 2 hard moves of tribal to a chill top out.
content.location: first route on the billiards wall 10ft left of senor fuerte

content.description: Sit start on the right side of the cave and move up into the large flake. Move left through pockets and crimps to the bulge. The grade is based on guidebooks, but this is so hard for the grade (much harder than V6).
content.location: Billiards wall past abase cave

content.description: Climb the overhanging face up through two large gold streaked huecos. Great problem with lots of good movement. A committing highball top out makes it even better.
content.protection: A large coffin shaped block at the base of this climb and the high top out require a couple pads and a spotter or two if you want a safe fall.
content.location: On the far right of the Billards Wall, look for a large coffin shaped block at the base with two large gold shaped huecos above it.

content.description: start up through pockets till you reach two shallow pocket features in the middle of the wall. from here make a large move to a sloper at the top of the wall. crux is high off the deck.
content.location: to the right of impact addict. straight up where the top of the wall drops about 5ft in height and is marked by a white sloper.

content.description: Start in an oval hueco and good feet. Move up to a rad pinch and make some tight moves up and left. Follow good huecos in good places up to a"capstone" and top out to the left.
content.protection: There are a couple of small trees near the climb. Easily protected with good spotters.
content.location: Just before you reach The Scream there are two trees that tighten the path. The climb is right in front of these trees starting in an oval hueco.

content.description: climb straight up through many pockets. a great warm up for the area.
content.location: 15ft right of "no name #2"

content.description: climb straight up through several good pockets. a great warm up for the area.
content.location: 10ft right of "no name #1"

content.description: climb straight up through many good pockets to a sloping topout under a tree on the top of the wall. a great warm up for the area.
content.location: 15ft right of general hospital starting in a round hueco and 2 finger pocket.

content.description: right hand on sloper and jump start to a sloping edge. finish straight up on a thin face to a high topout.
content.location: starts 5ft to the right of large orange stained hueco.

content.description: sit down start on big edge and go straight up on good pockets
content.location: sit down start a few feet to the right of foxy doxy start.

content.description: Pull straight out through large shallow hueco, and up the highest part of the wall, moving through a pinch sidepull to the large hueco in the middle of the wall; make a long reach for a pocket. Also the finish of the billiards wall traverse.
content.location: Just 7 feet to the right of Vile Betrayer and Senior Fuerte.

content.description: start on pockets under bulge and dyno up to the obvious hump, then pull over using a large pocket to help you top out.
content.location: 5ft right of "glory putri"

content.description: Start in a two finger pocket to the left of The Scream (Scream is the two giant obvious huecos stacked on top of each other). Climb upwards. Thin.
content.location: the right end of billiards wall, before the trail goes uphill

content.description: Starts in the jugs just in front (behind) of the tree. Move up and through the jugs, finishing slightly left on horizontal crack. Top out is covered in lichen (and scary).
content.location: Directly in front of the tree; 10 feet right of Impact addict; Directly right of Four Pigs.

content.description: Start on a large, round hueco. Move up through good pockets to a interesting topout. This is a fun one
content.protection: Crashpads. An awesome landing. Slightly sloping out from the wall
content.location: Toward the end of Billiards Wall. This climb follows the line of pockets to a sloper top out 5ft* to the right of "the scream" huecos.

content.description: start on the ledge in the black dihedral and climb straight up and to the right of the large tree leaning on the wall.
content.location: same start as "the 5th Commandment" but go straight up

content.description: move up through pockets trending right and link into the horizontal crack to finish the same top out as glory putri.
content.location: starts between "sack up" and "glory putri"

content.description: Starts on ledges in a black dihedral same as "foxy doxy" Traverse right across sloping jugs to a horn followed by tight moves on crimps to an awesome orange stained hueco about 10' high and continue right to top out the same as muffin man.
content.protection: Crashpads. Spotters are nice to have for the end.
content.location: About half way down Billiards Wall. Sit start in a black dihedral same as "foxy doxy" but traverse right into an orange stained hueco and continue right finishing on muffin mans top out.

content.description: Start on Glory Putri, traverse left on pockets, finish Impact Addict.
content.location: Glory Putri start

content.description: sit start and climb up to the large orange stained hueco and finish left on "larapase man".
content.location: sit start directly under the large orange stained hueco.

content.description: Sit start/low start in the belly-button-height hueco that has a two finger pocket in the bottom of the hueco. More pockets and crimps abound. The starting hueco is about 6" in diameter and should be obvious.
content.location: the right end of billiards wall, 10 feet right of a large rock in the trail

content.description: Shady in the summer time, home to several great problems with highball topouts.
